form.name: aspnetForm

div.p: Woodland Hills School District will begin transitioning to virtual instruction for all students. We will begin online instruction on Tuesday April 14th. Our actions are consistent with the recommendations of leading health officials on how to limit the spread of COVID-19 and are also consistent with similar decisions made by a number of our peer institutions.

span.p: Woodland Hills School District will begin transitioning to virtual instruction for all students. We will begin online instruction on Tuesday April 14th. Our actions are consistent with the recommendations of leading health officials on how to limit the spread of COVID-19 and are also consistent with similar decisions made by a number of our peer institutions.
